calculations.name: # Complaints (Selected)
calculations.tableau_expression: IF ATTR([Product Grouping]) = [Parameters].[Selected Product] THEN [Number of Complaints] END

calculation_context.Expression: IF ATTR([Product Grouping]) = [Parameters].[Selected Product] THEN [Number of Complaints] END

calculated_fields.Product Grouping:
CASE [Product]
WHEN 'Bank account or service' THEN 'BANK SERVICES'
WHEN 'Checking or savings account' THEN 'CHECKING / SAVINGS'
WHEN 'Credit card' THEN 'CREDIT CARD'
WHEN 'Mortgage' THEN 'MORTGAGE'
ELSE 'OTHER' END
